fullplot: Edward Lionheart (Vincent Price) stars as an actor overlooked for a critics' acting award, despite producing a season of Shakespeare plays. After confronting the Critics' Circle, an attempted suicidal dive into the Thames results in Lionheart being rescued by your typical paraffin/meths/turps swigging tramps. Lionheart then (presumed dead) exacts his grizzly, and quite amusing revenge on the critics who denied him his finest hour.
plot: A Shakespearean actor takes poetic revenge on the critics who denied him recognition.
title: Theatre of Blood

tomatoes.consensus: Deliciously campy and wonderfully funny, Theater of Blood features Vincent Price at his melodramatic best.
